select u.email as email_address, u.handle
from email_user u, coder_notify n
where u.user_id = n.coder_id
and u.status = 'A'
and n.notify_id = 1
and u.user_id in (
269025,7485898,275071,7459080,11797255,309982,13261056,156216,262936,
153656,8355516,2059354,7390224,8349097,8601171,10428762,7452866,10481120,
270505,346607,9906197,287105,7390467,297823,7442498,7479769,289706,
8357090,10599449,293874,155880,10574855,7462740,277659,301937,308453,
274023,284007,288584,107835,279471,7393427,287568,7338095,10157606,
9958600,119676,13377493,7360309,150498,152342,7463987,302053,7548200,
299979,10098406,7489235,7251152,7210680,286907,277356,278342,297731,
7545675,289824,289307,287266)
